name: Jaethoria
storyline: The gods had forgotten these lands. There was a war between the two countries. When the gods remembered again, the war was very heated and they had to get involved. The eternal war started in the world of Jaethoria. They chose their side and joined the war. They granted immortality to the soldiers who participated in the war between the countries of Juthenia and Undratheia. Soldiers who could die and revive again. Thus, an immortal human race was formed. After a while of peace, the soldiers wanted to fight. The gods created a Battlefield for them and continued their eternal war here.
